concise_definition: v. 进步, 前进, 发展 (progress 的现在分词形式)

definitions.explanation_en: To move forward or advance toward a goal, often implying steady, continuous improvement or development over time.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指朝着某个目标稳步前进，通常暗示随着时间推移持续的改进或发展。
definitions.example_en: The team is progressing well on the new design despite the challenges.
definitions.example_cn: 尽管面临挑战，团队在新设计上进展顺利。

definitions.explanation_en: To make measurable or noticeable advancement in a process, condition, or state, especially in education, technology, or personal growth.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指在某个过程、状况或状态中取得可衡量或显著的进步，尤其用于教育、科技或个人成长领域。
definitions.example_en: She has been progressing rapidly in her studies since she adopted a structured routine.
definitions.example_cn: 自从她养成了有条理的学习习惯后，她的学业进步神速。

definitions.explanation_en: To continue moving forward in a sequence or timeline, often used in contexts of time, events, or narrative flow.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指在时间、事件或叙事流程中持续向前推进。
definitions.example_en: As the story is progressing, the protagonist faces increasingly difficult moral choices.
definitions.example_cn: 随着故事的发展，主人公面临越来越艰难的道德抉择。

comparison.analysis: “Advancing” (推进) 更强调主动推动某事物向前，常用于技术、军事或战略语境，带有更强的目的性和控制性。而 “progressing” 更侧重于状态的自然演变或持续改善，不一定强调主动干预。
“Improving” (改善) 专指质量、条件或表现的提升，通常隐含从较差到较好的转变。而 “progressing” 可以是中性或积极的前进，不一定涉及质量变化，例如从A阶段到B阶段的单纯推进。
“Moving” (移动/进展) 是一个更宽泛、更口语化的词，可指物理位移或抽象进展，但缺乏 “progressing” 所蕴含的系统性、持续性和目标导向的内涵。例如 “moving on” 可表示放弃或转移，而 “progressing” 始终指向积极发展。
